alert.note: Alert for Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 9:50PM CDT until April 26 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Gillespie County in south central Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 950 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Doss, or 16 miles south of Mason, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Cherry Spring, Crabapple, Doss, Enchanted Rock State Natural Area and Harper. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Texas. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
